about.details:
Incorporated in 2020, ATC Energies System Limited is a company that operates in the energy sector, focusing on providing energy solutions, products, and services.

The company produces and supplies efficient, low-cost lithium and Li-ion batteries, offering integrated energy storage solutions for industries like banking, automobiles, and other end users.

The company started by producing mini batteries for the banking industry and now manufactures batteries of all sizes, offering customized solutions for various industries and applications through in-house design and engineering.
The company’s registered office is in Mumbai, with factories in Vasai, Thane, and Noida. These factories house advanced equipment for battery assembly, including temperature chambers, welding systems, and testers.
Products:v The company provides products for various industries:
  • Banking: POS machines, ATMs
  • Automobiles: Electric vehicles, two/three-wheelers
  • Industrial UPS, Energy storage systems, and Weighing scales.
As of February 28, 2025, the company had 81 employees out of which approximately 33% were women.
Competitive Strengths:
  • Diversified product portfolio catering to various industries / end-use applications offering diverse solutions.
  • Focus on quality and performance.
  • Experienced Leadership and Workforce Team
  • Stable financial performance

faqs.question: What is the ATC Energies IPO?
faqs.answer:
ATC Energies IPO is a SME IPO of 5403600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹63.76 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹118 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on March 25, 2025, and closes on March 27, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in ATC Energies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in ATC Energies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in ATC Energies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in ATC Energies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'ATC Energies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When ATC Energies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The ATC Energies IPO opens on March 25, 2025 and closes on March 27, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of ATC Energies IPO?
faqs.answer: ATC Energies IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,41,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for ATC Energies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in ATC Energies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is ATC Energies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for ATC Energies IPO will be done on Friday, March 28, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, April 1, 2025. Check the ATC Energies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is ATC Energies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The ATC Energies IPO listing date is on Wednesday, April 2, 2025.
